contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox oil field | name = Yibal | image = | caption = | location_map = Oman | location_map_width = | location_map_text = Location of the Yibaloil field within Oman | lat_d = 22 | lat_m = 10 | lat_s = 0 | lat_NS = N | long_d = 56 | long_m = 0 | long_s = 0 | long_EW = E | coordinates_type = type:landmark | coordinates_display= inline,title | coordinates_ref = | country = [[Oman]] | region = | location = Onshore | block = | offonshore = | operators = [[petroleum development oman]] | partners = | contractors = | discovery = | start_development = | start_production = 1968 | peak_year = | abandonment = | peak_of_production_oil_bbl/d = 250000 | peak_of_production_oil_tpy = | peak_of_production_gas_mmcuft/d = | peak_of_production_gas_mmscm/d = | peak_of_production_gas_bcm/y = | oil_production_bbl/d = 88000 | oil_production_tpy = | production_year_oil = | production_gas_mmcuft/d = | production_gas_mmscm/d = | production_gas_bcm/y = | production_year_gas = | est_oil_bbl = | est_oil_t = | recover_oil_bbl = | recover_oil_t = | est_gas_bft = | est_gas_bcm = | recover_gas_bft = | recover_gas_bcm = | formations = }} '''Yibal''' is the largest [[oilfield]] in [[Oman]]. It began production in 1968, and at its peak had a production of nearly {{Convert|250000|oilbbl/d|m3/d}}. In recent years, it has begun to decline, and in 2005 produces about {{Convert|88000|oilbbl/d|m3/d}}. The Yibal oil field is operated primarily by [[Petroleum Development Oman]]. [[Category:Oil fields of Oman]] [[Category:Geography of Oman]] {{Oman-geo-stub}} {{Oilfield-stub}}
